frontend.components.map package¶

Submodules¶

frontend.components.map.airbnbMarker module¶

class frontend.components.map.airbnbMarker.AirbnbMarker(id_listing, lon, lat, source)¶

Bases: kivy_garden.mapview.view.MapMarkerPopup

This class expands MapMarkerPopup It displays a marker for a given latitude, longitude and source file.

Parameters

  • id_listing (int) – id of a listing

  • lon (float) – longitude of listing

  • lat (float) – latitude of listing

  • source (str) – path to source file used to display marker

on_release()¶

If marker is clicked a popup with additional information is opened and marker turns blue

reset_marker(*args)¶

resets marker back to default image

Parameters

*args

frontend.components.map.customCluster module¶

class frontend.components.map.customCluster.CustomCluster(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: kivy_garden.mapview.clustered_marker_layer.ClusterMapMarker, kivy.uix.behaviors.button.ButtonBehavior

This class expands the ClusterMapMarker. since in the original implementation there was no way to change the source file, we created this class for the only purpose of adding a source file.
